WelcomeToHelpPage: Find assistance on various topics below.
HelpCreateAccountDesc: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage. Fill in the required fields, including your name, email, and password. Once completed, check your email for a verification code.
HelpResetPasswordDesc: If you've forgotten your password, click on the 'Forgot Password?' link on the login page. Enter your email address, and you'll receive a password reset link.
HelpUpdateProfile: How to Update Your Profile Information
HelpUpdateProfileDesc: To update your profile, log into your account and navigate to the 'Profile' section. Here, you can change your name, email, phone number, and dietary preferences.
HelpPlaceOrderDesc: After logging in, select your child's name, choose the desired meals, and add them to your cart. Proceed to checkout to confirm your order.
HelpContactSupportDesc: For any questions or issues, you can contact support through the 'Contact Us' page. You can also reach us at support@schoolcanteen.com.
ContactSupport: For further assistance, please contact our support team.
WelcomeToFAQ: Find answers to common questions below.
FAQPlaceOrder: How do I place an order for my child?
FAQPlaceOrderDesc: Select your child's name, choose their desired meals, and add them to the cart. Once done, proceed to checkout and confirm the order.
FAQCancelModifyOrder: Can I cancel or modify an order after it's placed?
FAQCancelModifyOrderDesc: Orders can be canceled within a certain time period. Please check the 'Order History' section for options to cancel.
FAQPaymentMethodsDesc: We accept online payment options like Stripe. Payments are securely processed through our payment system.
FAQOrderHistory: How do I check my child’s order history?
FAQOrderHistoryDesc: To view past orders, go to the 'Order History' section on your account dashboard. Here, you’ll find details about all past and current orders.
FAQChildAbsent: What happens if my child is absent on the day of the order?
FAQChildAbsentDesc: If your child is absent, please cancel the order as early as possible.
FAQContactSupport: How do I contact support if I have issues with the system?
FAQContactSupportDesc: For any assistance, please contact support at support@evalgykla.com or call us at the provided contact number on the support page.
